Welcome to the RiverGuide. Please read these Terms of Service carefully before any using the services available on this website.

Your access to and use the RiverGuide is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, RiverGuide members and others who access or use these services.

By accessing or using our services you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the RiverGuide.

User accounts

When you create an account with us you must provide a valid email address and name which does not violate our Code of Conduct.

Code of conduct

The users of the RiverGuide depend on user submitted content to discover and plan experiences in freshwater environments. You agree that all content you submit to the RiverGuide, including guide descriptions and activity reports, are truthful and accurate. If it is found that your content is intentionally misleading or inaccurate we reserve the right to delete it without notice.

We expect that all content honours our RiverGuide Community Code of Conduct. It is prohibited to submit any content that:

  • is illegal, obscene, defamatory, threatening, harassing, abusive, or hateful or that advocates violence.
  • harms of interferes with our services or those of our third-party’s networks, equipment, applications, services or websites.
  • violates any privacy, intellectual property, publicity or other personal rights including, but not limited to, copyrights, patents and trademarks.
  • is fraudulent or contains false or misleading information.
  • is intended to bring harm to those who use the information, or any other parties, such as intentionally misleading land land access details or water safety information.
  • violates the RiverGuide Code of Conduct in any other way.

Any submitted content which violates these Terms of Service will be deleted as soon as practicable without notice. We do not guarantee that user submitted content which violates the Code of Conduct will be removed immediately.
